abstract: Rupert Murdoch, a coarse, self-seeking tabloid king, has become a potential savior who will rescue Dow Jones.
snippet: Rupert Murdoch, a coarse, self-seeking tabloid king, has become a potential savior who will rescue Dow Jones.
lead_paragraph: The meeting later today between Rupert Murdoch and the Bancroft family that could determine the fate of Dow Jones & Company, publisher of The Wall Street Journal, would seem to be a very modern media moment.

headline.main: Mr. Murdoch Comes Round for Tea
headline.print_headline: Mr. Murdoch Comes Round For Tea

abstract: Dow Jones‘s controlling Bancroft family is expected to sit down today with Rupert Murdoch for a meeting that could determine the fate of his $5 billion bid for the company. The next hurdle in the negotiations will likely be what bankers call “social issues,” The New York Times’s DealBook wrote Sunday — specifically, how Mr. Murdoch plans to protect the editorial independence of The Wall Street Journal. On Monday, The Times’s Media Equation column looked at how Mr. Murdoch might play his role as ardent suitor to a skeptical audience.
lead_paragraph: Dow Jones‘s controlling Bancroft family is expected to sit down today with Rupert Murdoch for a meeting that could determine the fate of his $5 billion bid for the company. The next hurdle in the negotiations will likely be what bankers call “social issues,” The New York Times’s DealBook wrote Sunday — specifically, how Mr. Murdoch plans to protect the editorial independence of The Wall Street Journal. headline.main: What’s Next in Mr. Murdoch’s Playbook?

abstract: Even as the Bancroft family finally sat down with Rupert Murdoch on Monday, it appeared other players in the Dow Jones saga were trying to take matters into their own hands — possibly literally.
lead_paragraph: Even as the Bancroft family finally sat down with Rupert Murdoch on Monday, it appeared other players in the Dow Jones saga were trying to take matters into their own hands — possibly literally.

headline.main: Is Dow Jones’s Union Pursuing an ESOP?
